movie.title: Secretariat
movie.plot: Housewife and mother Penny Chenery agrees to take over her ailing father's Virginia-based Meadow Stables, despite her lack of horse-racing knowledge. Against all odds, Chenery -- with the help of veteran trainer Lucien Laurin -- manages to navigate the male-dominated business, ultimately fostering the first Triple Crown winner in twenty-five years.

events.title: Secretariat won the Belmont Stakes race, and in doing so became the first horse in 25 years to win the Triple Crown
